Posts.Content: KRB wrote: I started chemo in April 2008 weighing 144.  My last treatment was May 22nd and I am weighing 168!  This is very upsetting to me, I have tried for so long to lose the weight and now here I am again!  Does anyone know how long it takes for the bloatedness and puffiness to go away!  I have been watching what I eat I stay under 2000 calories a day, but nothing is changing.  When will I start seeing some weight loss? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long to lose weight after chemo KRB NancyD
